channel.title: Server coding help
channel.description: Hey people, I wanna learn to start coding. Where can i learn to start coding either 317s or 508s? i really really wanna learn, and if u think 317s would be easier to learn then give me that, same with the 508s. Thank-you sooooo much.

item.title: Server coding help
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Everyone says to start off by telling you to Google “learning Java”, but quite frankly not everyone has the time or patience to read up on that and learn basics-experienced levels of Java. Me personally, I learned Java from just trial and error and posting on here to solve my problems when I was a peasant to coding but now I’m pretty good with coding, I started off with 317’s and I eventually stepped up to 508’s and I still don’t completely understand them. 317’s are easy to code if you know what you’re doing, but even people that don’t know what their doing can still do simple things like adding a command. I’d start off with some of the 2007 sources like Pimpscape, cheez scape, etc. If you ever have any coding questions, PM me and I’ll help you out to the best of my ability.

Read full topic

item.title: Server coding help
item.dc:creator: @iScape0 iScape0
item.description:
@iScape0 wrote:

mangalover51:

start on 317’s… cuz theres only one main file that you do most things in which is client.java

Same advice, but client.java is for people that want to edit a server and call it their own, esentially LEECHing a server

Read full topic
